"Only the Powerful":
"This seems like a good mission for me.
Defeating a giant transforming Mech...
This should let me show off my power.
Leader, do you want to go with me?
Two people might not be enough for this...
Perhaps we should take a Weaponoid with
a similar overwhelming power to mine?
On this team... That would be Elder Pain.
※Clear on Normal or higher accompanied
only by Ignis and Elder Pain"
